
Editions Description
====================

| Edition | Description                                                                       |
|:--------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| `NPM/`  | The edition published on [`NPM`][NPM-en]. ※ `@ltd/j-globals` is not `j-globals`! |

[NPM-en]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ltd/j-globals "Node Package Manager"

| 版本    | 说明                                                                              |
